title: Ticket #3426: Lark dhcp queries should go through the correct interface
description:
Right now, the Discovery/Offer of the DHCP transaction goes out IPADDR_ANY. In some configurations, this may not end up going on the correct interface.

We should make sure the client goes through the correct interface - either do the D/O from within the network namespace or make sure the socket is using the LarkBridgeDevice.
